property.label: Custom Query
property.name: customQuery
property.description: Write a SOQL query to find a singular Contact or Account record during registration. See docs for more information on using form values as bind variables.

property.label: Access Level for SOQL Query
property.name: accessLevelMode
property.description: Default: Query runs in System mode with elevated access to records. Restrict access by selecting User and configuring Org Sharing appropriately.

property.label: Create Record on Registration (if not found)
property.name: createNotFound
property.description: Create a Contact record of the specified type, if a record is not found when registering

property.label: Object Type to Create
property.name: objectCreateType
property.description: Choose an object type. The registration process creates a new record if the SOQL query doesn't find any results. NOTE: Create record on Registration must be set to TRUE.

property.label: Account Id
property.name: accountId
property.description: If creating a Contact, set the Account Id that the Contact will be related to. If using Person Accounts, leave this field blank.

property.label: Person Account Record Type
property.name: personAccountRecordTypeId
property.description: If creating a Person Account, set the Record Type that should be used. Setup Person Accounts via Setup before configuring this option. If using Contacts, leave this field blank as it is ignored.

property.label: Send Email Confirmation
property.name: sendEmailConfirmation
property.description: Send email confirmation on successful registration of a user. Consider switching off, if using another solution for sending email communications such as Marketing Cloud

property.label: Sign Up Button Label
property.name: registerButtonSignUpMessage
property.description: Text used on the submit button

property.label: Sign Up Button Waiting Message
property.name: registerButtonWaitingMessage
property.description: Text used after submit button is clicked

property.label: Password Match Error Message
property.name: passwordMatchError
property.description: Error message shown if passwords do not match

property.label: Username Taken Error Message
property.name: usernameTakenMessage
property.description: Error message shown if the chosen username is already taken
property.default: The specified username is already taken. Please choose a unique username.

property.label: Record Not Found Error Message
property.name: noRecordFoundError
property.description: Error message shown if the SOQL query doesn't find any results. Shown to the user.
property.default: There was a problem locating your details, please check them and try again or contact us for further assistance.

property.label: Multiple Records Found Error Message
property.name: multipleRecordsFoundError
property.description: Error message shown if the SOQL query finds more than one result. Shown to the user.
property.default: There was a problem locating your details, please check them and try again or contact us for further assistance.

property.label: Record Create Error Message
property.name: errorOnCreate
property.description: Error message shown if a failure occurs creating a new record during registration. Shown to the user.
property.default: There was a problem registering your details. Please contact us for assistance.

property.label: Login after Registration Error Message
property.name: portalLoginError
property.description: Error message shown if a failure occurs logging into the portal after registration. Shown to the user.
property.default: There was a problem logging you into the portal. Please contact us for further assistance.

property.label: User Creation Error Message
property.name: portalRegistrationError
property.description: Error message shown if a failure occurs during registration when creating a new user. Shown to the user.
property.default: There was a problem during registration. Please contact us for further assistance.

property.label: Already Registered Error Message
property.name: portalRegistrationUserExists
property.description: Error message shown if the matched contact is already a portal user. Shown to the user.
property.default: User is already registered. Please login to continue.
